name: 許志明
objective:
硬體簡介、影像處理 (單色、彩色、3D 及即時)、圖案識別 (Patten Recognition)、機械視覺於順序控制之應用、機械視覺於回授控制之應用、高速檢測、機械人與機械視覺之結合及應用。
Introduction to Hardware of Vision System, Image Processing (Monochrome, Color, 3D and real-time), Pattern Recognition, Application of MV to Sequential Control Application of MV to Feedback Control. High Speed Inspection, Combined Applications of Robotics and MV.
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG1：消除貧窮（No Poverty）SDG3：良好健康和福祉（Good Health and Well-being）SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）
